verbose_text: The first identified NLRs, NOD1, and NOD2, were determined to recognize bacterial peptidoglycan moieties and trigger inflammation by activating NF-kappaB and MAP kinase (MAPK) pathways.
evidence: NOD1, and NOD2, were determined to recognize bacterial peptidoglycan moieties                                                                                              and trigger inflammation by activating NF-kappaB and MAP
